desc: Adds possible Sick effect to normal attack

dictionary.lore: A lance that had been pierced into bedrock since ancient times. It is said that when the hero Agaron pulled it out, the color of its point had changed to an emerald tone. Any person injured by this lance would fall ill in a matter of days, ultimately leading to their death. Recent research has discovered that an unknown virus had probably established its colony at the tip of the lance, giving the impression that it was mere corrosion.

name: Emerald Pike
